hook.text: Ask someone to volunteer 40 hours a week. They refuse. Then ask for 2 hours. Suddenly they say yes.

buildup.text: The door-in-the-face technique starts with an extreme request, then retreats to a smaller, real one.

discovery.text: The retreat triggers reciprocity â€” the other side feels obligated to match your concession with one of their own.

climax.text: The key: the initial ask must be unreasonable but not absurd, or credibility collapses.

punchline.text: Ask big first. The 'compromise' was always the real goal.
